name: market for leachate, SLF, sludge from pulp and paper production | leachate, SLF, sludge from pulp and paper production | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/28429/documentation

This is a market activity, representing a treatment mix. In the case of products needing treatment, market mixes are supplied by the activities treating the product in the geography defined by the market, and they supply the activities needing to treat the product, as they have generated it as a by-product in the Undefined processes (present as a negative input in system models). Transport to the treating facility or losses are also accounted in this type of markets, when relevant. This is the market for 'leachate, SLF, sludge from pulp and paper production' in the geography of Europe without Switzerland. Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.

The activity starts with the input from the treatment processes.

A market for a material for treatment (wastes or recyclables) ends with the provision of treatment, i.e. a mix of treatment providers, to activities that generate the reference product as a waste/by-product.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/37:Sewerage/370:Sewerage/3700:Sewerage

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: The disposal mix is country-specific for Europe without Switzerland.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The dataset supplies a disposal mix (technology mix) of 'leachate, SLF, sludge from pulp and paper production' to the respective waste producing activities.

flow.name: leachate, SLF, sludge from pulp and paper production
flow.category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/37:Sewerage/370:Sewerage/3700:Sewerage

exchanges.description: calculated based on the properties of the leachate as they are shown in the respective treatment dataset. For Europe without Switzerland, 12.70% losses are considered (Doka G., 2021. A model for composition-specific life cycle inventories of regionalised wastewater fates, Separate publication, Doka LCA, Zurich, Switzerland. http://www.doka.ch/publications.htm)

calculated based on the properties of the leachate as they are shown in the respective treatment dataset. For Europe without Switzerland, 12.70% losses are considered (Doka G., 2021.
